ctxs.title: Chat_Log

question: I'm currently at the Whispering Woods. Which direction should I go to reach the Enchanted Lake?

ctxs.title: Whispering Woods - East
ctxs.text: Heading east from the Whispering Woods, you'll find the Sunlit Meadows, filled with wildflowers and chirping birds.

ctxs.title: Whispering Woods - North
ctxs.text: To the north of the Whispering Woods lies a dense forest with ancient trees. It's a challenging path, often shrouded in mist, but it eventually leads to the Enchanted Lake.

ctxs.title: Whispering Woods - South
ctxs.text: To the south of the Whispering Woods is the Dark Cavern. It's an eerie place.

ctxs.title: Whispering Woods - West
ctxs.text: Going west from the Whispering Woods, you'll come across the Crystal Stream. Following the stream will eventually guide you to the Happy Valley, but the path is winding and longer.

ctxs.title: Whispering Woods - Center
ctxs.text: Staying in the center of the Whispering Woods, you'll be surrounded by towering trees and the soothing sounds of nature. This is the heart of the forest.
